<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Reclaimed](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=313)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 73</row>

</column>

A unit of Crimson Reclaimers saved you from certain death in the Gravelands. You spent time with one or more Crimson Reclaimers as they escorted you to safety, and you've learned the ways of this faction of the Knights of Lastwall. You consider yourself forever in their debt and defend their reputation unquestioningly against any accusations of duplicity.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill, and the [Crimson Reclaimers Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Coercion](/Feats.aspx?ID=788) skill feat.
